meta.content: Tiger Pride - In Ourselves and in Our School Â

font.em: Tiger Pride - In Ourselves and in Our School

strong.font: Browerville Public Schools is a small, PreK-12 school district located in central Minnesota.Â With a student body of approximatelyÂ 540 students, every student enjoys a personalized one-on-one education, small student-to-teacher ratios, a large selection of electives, college-credit classes, and the ability to participate in almost every available activity.Â We strive to enhance each student to their fullest potential!
